item.title: Home
item.content:encoded:
PORTFOLIO

PORTFOLIO

I'm Pia, a stylist and creative based between New York and London. Before fashion, I was a journalist. After fashion, I'll be an icon.

I've been a resident of the fashion world for 12 years and counting. I've created, critiqued, consulted, styled, forecasted, and directed.

Ashish Arun

Select Works

 
203 Issue 
SQSP Magazine
Editorial Styling
Street Photography

When I'm not styling and directing, I provide creative consulting for luxury fashion brands across the globe. My travels have inspired my first book project, a coffee table book featuring street photography of the most fashionable people waiting for public transit.

Commercial folio available upon request.

Latest Project

Transit street photography,
Launching early next year

It all begins with an idea. Maybe you want to launch a business. Maybe you want to turn a hobby into something more. Or maybe you have a creative project to share with the world. Whatever it is, the way you tell your story online can make all the difference.

Quote Source
